channel.title: Al-Ahmadgaid B. Asaad on
channel.description: Recent content in Al-Ahmadgaid B. Asaad on

item.title: Where is Trinity in the Old Testament?
item.description: (A.S.)ʿAlayhi as-salām, Arabic for "Peace be upon him", Muslim honorific. (S.W.T.)Subhanahu wa ta'ala, Arabic for "May He be glorified and exalted", Muslim honorific. (S.A.W.)Ṣalla llāhu ʿalay-hi wa-alehe-wa-sallam, Arabic for "May Allah honour him and grant him peace", Muslim honorific. -- Assalamu ‘Alaikum (Peace be with you), may peace and blessings of the Almighty God be with you. If I said something that might go against you in the following discussion, I would like to sincerely ask for forgiveness.
